mapper.insert: insert into spider_info (product_id, brand_en, brand_zh, web_channel, product_title, product_type, product_size, img_url, origin_price, actual_price, lowest_price_flag, discount, discount_mode, has_discount_flag, shop_info, store_info, operate_type, operator, created_time) values (#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandZh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{webChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actualPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lowestPriceFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discountMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasDiscountFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{shopInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

INSERT INTO spider_info (product_id, brand_en,brand_zh, web_channel, product_title,product_type, product_size, img_url,origin_price, actual_price, lowest_price_flag,discount, discount_mode, has_discount_flag,shop_info, store_info, operate_type, operator, created_time) VALUES
(#{item.productId}, #{item.brandEn},#{item.brandZh}, #{item.webChannel}, #{item.productTitle},#{item.productType}, #{item.productSize}, #{item.imgUrl},#{item.originPrice}, #{item.actualPrice}, #{item.lowestPriceFlag},#{item.discount}, #{item.discountMode}, #{item.hasDiscountFlag},#{item.shopInfo}, #{item.storeInfo}, #{item.operateType}, #{item.operator}, #{item.createdTime})
